item.title: Get Anyone's Location Using Seeker
item.description:
Introduction Link to heading

In this tutorial, I will guide you on how to use the Seeker tool to obtain someone’s location. Seeker is a tool designed to send a link to the victim, and once clicked, it grabs the victim’s geolocation and IP address.

Prerequisites Link to heading

Before you begin, you need:

  • Seeker installed on your system
  • Python 3 installed

Installation Link to heading

STEP :1 Link to heading

First You Need To Download seeker Tools, So Download From Below Link

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: A Bit About Me...
item.description:
Cybersecurity professional with expertise in Elasticsearch SIEM, Logpoint SIEM, and Fortigate Firewall. Successfully reduced cyber threats, optimised security infrastructure, and led migration initiatives. Holder of MSC in Computer Forensics & Cybersecurity.
